ServiceNow Notification Templates

Modern HTML email templates to make your notifications stand out

August 21, 2024
ServiceNow Email Templates

macOS Style Native & clean design

ServiceNow notifications are crucial for keeping users informed, but let's be honest - the default styling could use some serious love. I've created 5 modern HTML templates that will make your notifications stand out and actually get read.

Tesla Style - Minimalist & Futuristic

Perfect for: System alerts, status updates, critical notifications

The Tesla template embodies the sleek, minimalist aesthetic that Tesla is known for. Clean lines, subtle shadows, and a professional color scheme make this template perfect for system-level notifications.

Key Features

  • Clean white background with Tesla-inspired shadows
  • Minimal color palette (white, black, Tesla red accents)
  • Professional typography with excellent readability
  • Smooth hover effects and transitions
  • Responsive design that works on all devices

Design Philosophy: Less is more. This template focuses on clarity and professionalism while maintaining visual appeal.

Download Tesla Template

Google Style - Material Design

Perfect for: User communications, approval requests, general updates

The Google template follows Material Design principles with clean cards, proper elevation, and Google's signature color palette. It's perfect for user-facing communications that need to feel familiar and trustworthy.

Key Features

  • Material Design card layout with proper elevation
  • Google's color scheme (blue, red, yellow, green accents)
  • Subtle shadows and smooth animations
  • Accessible design patterns
  • Professional yet approachable feel

Design Philosophy: Familiar and trustworthy. Users instantly recognize and trust Google's design language.

Adobe Style - Editorial & Professional

Perfect for: Creative teams, design requests, content approvals

The Adobe template features a clean editorial design with a signature red accent bar and professional typography. It's perfect for creative teams and design-related requests that need to feel polished and trustworthy.

Key Features

  • Editorial-style layout with clean typography
  • Adobe's signature red accent bar
  • Professional color scheme (white, black, red accents)
  • Clean information hierarchy
  • Subtle borders and spacing

Design Philosophy: Editorial excellence. This template brings the same level of polish and professionalism that Adobe's products are known for.

ChatGPT Style - Modern & Conversational

Perfect for: AI-related requests, knowledge base updates, user support

The ChatGPT template features a modern dark header with a conversational design approach. It uses timeline-style information display and ChatGPT's signature green color scheme, making it perfect for AI-related requests and knowledge management.

Key Features

  • Dark header with ChatGPT branding
  • Timeline-style information display
  • ChatGPT's signature green color scheme
  • Modern rounded corners and shadows
  • Conversational and approachable feel

Design Philosophy: Modern and conversational. This template brings the same friendly, approachable feel that ChatGPT is known for.

macOS Style - Native & Clean

Perfect for: Internal communications, system notifications, general updates

The macOS template mimics the native macOS interface with window controls, system fonts, and Apple's design language. It's perfect for internal communications that need to feel familiar and native to Mac users.

Key Features

  • Native macOS window design with traffic light controls
  • Apple's system fonts and typography
  • Property list-style information display
  • macOS color scheme and spacing
  • Clean, minimal interface design

Design Philosophy: Native and familiar. This template brings the same clean, intuitive feel that macOS users know and love.
